title: Major study finds omicron more vaccine resistant, causes milder illness in South Africa
content:
1. Major study finds omicron more vaccine resistant, causes milder illness in South Africa  NBC News
  2. LIVE: The WHO gives an update as Omicron variant spreads  Reuters
  3. Omicron is spreading fast. That's alarming even if it's mild  CNN
  4. WHO says omicron is spreading at a rate not seen with any other Covid variant  CNBC
  5. Many Omicron patients “not as seriously ill” as in previous Covid waves say doctors - BBC News  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Major study finds omicron more vaccine resistant, causes milder illness in South Africa  NBC News
LIVE: The WHO gives an update as Omicron variant spreads  Reuters
Omicron is spreading fast. That's alarming even if it's mild  CNN
WHO says omicron is spreading at a rate not seen with any other Covid variant  CNBC
Many Omicron patients “not as seriously ill” as in previous Covid waves say doctors - BBC News  BBC News

localize.title: 南アフリカで、オミクロンのワクチン耐性が高く、軽症であることを示す大規模な研究が行われました。
重大研究发现南非的欧米茄对疫苗的抵抗力更强，导致的疾病更轻微
重大研究發現南非的歐米茄對疫苗的抵抗力更強，導致的疾病更輕微
